https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pAlHgZg5JHuRkn9ebrsP60ya6DG.jpg This is an omnibus of six short films by six different directors, whose lead characters are unconventional women. They are "Hijoshi," females who live true to themselves and their desires. An Encyclopedia of Unconventional Women
